content: length fit tip try on sweater to see if the sleeve is the right length for you work a few more rounds if necessary to bring the sleeve to the correct length before working the ribbing ribbing change to needle two sizes smaller than gauge needle for working small circumferences bottom sleeve ribbing round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round work round 1 until ribbing measures 2 bind off in pattern finishing weave in loose ends block to finished measurements 5 schematic and notes a 32 5 36 5 40 5 44 5 48 5 52 5 56 5 60 5 b 18 c 13 25 d 11 5 12 13 14 25 15 16 17 18 e 8 8 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 yorkana pullover copyright 2023 liverpool yarns www liverpoolyarns com liverpoolyarns@gmail com all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced for business trade or sale 6
